CompanyDescription: Bridge Bancorp, Inc., (the "Registrant" or "Holding Company") is a registered bank holding company for BNB Bank, which was known as The Bridgehampton National Bank prior to the Bank's conversion to a New York chartered commercial bank in December 2017. The Holding Company was incorporated under the laws of the State of New York in 1988 to serve as the holding company for the Bank. Since commencing business in March 1989, the Holding Company has functioned primarily as the holder of all of the Bank's common stock. In May 1999, the Bank established a real estate investment trust subsidiary, Bridgehampton Community, Inc. ("BCI"), as an operating subsidiary. The assets of BCI are viewed by the bank regulators as part of the Bank's assets in consolidation.
